title: Media information
description: Media context information for content related interactions.

mediaTimed.title: Timed media information
mediaTimed.description: Information related to timed media main content, such as ads and chapters.

primaryAssetReference.title: Primary asset reference
primaryAssetReference.description: Asset information about the main content that was played, present on all ads and chapters that occur during the content's playback.

_id.title: Asset ID
_id.description: Identifier of the content, which can be used to tie back to other industry or CMS IDs.

title.title: Content name
title.description: The friendly, human-readable name of the timed media asset.

duration.title: Media content length
duration.description: Length of primary media asset in seconds.

releaseDate.title: First digital date
releaseDate.description: The date when the content first aired on any digital channel or platform.

Audio.title: Audio
Audio.description: Metadata specific to audio content (record label, radio station, etc.).

artist.title: Artist
artist.description: The name of the album artist or group performing the music recording or video.

album.title: Album
album.description: The name of the album that the music recording or video belongs to.

Audio.title: Audio
Audio.description: Metadata specific to audio content (record label, radio station, etc.).

showType.title: Show type
showType.description: The type of content for example, trailer or full episode.

Series.title: Series
Series.description: The series the show belongs to.

Season.title: Season
Season.description: The season the show belongs to.

Episode.title: Episode
Episode.description: The episode the show belongs to.

Genre.title: Genre
Genre.description: Type or grouping of content as defined by content producer.

Rating.title: Content rating
Rating.description: The rating as defined by Parental Guidelines.

Creator.title: Creator
Creator.description: Party or parties including person or organization which created the video, refinement by the role attribute.

streamFormat.title: Stream format
streamFormat.description: Free-form format of the stream for example, short or long.

streamType.title: Stream type
streamType.description: The type of the media stream

firstAirDate.title: First air date
firstAirDate.description: The date when the content first aired on television.

primaryAssetViewDetails.title: Primary asset view details
primaryAssetViewDetails.description: View details for the main content playback, present on all ads and chapters that occur during the content's playback.

_id.title: Media session ID
_id.description: Identifies an instance of a content stream unique to an individual playback.

videoSegment.title: Video segment
videoSegment.description: The interval that describes the part of the content that has been viewed in minutes.

path.title: Video path
path.description: The path to the video in the app or site.

broadcastChannel.title: Content channel
broadcastChannel.description: Distribution channel from where the content was played.

broadcastContentType.title: Broadcast content type
broadcastContentType.description: The type of the stream delivery.

playerSDKVersion.title: Player SDK version
playerSDKVersion.description: The SDK version used by the player.

vhlVersion.title: VHL version
vhlVersion.description: The Media SDK version used for the tracking session.

adLoadType.title: Ad load type
adLoadType.description: The type of ad loaded as defined by each customer's internal representation.

sourceFeed.title: Feed type
sourceFeed.description: The type of feed, which can either represent actual feed-related data such as  EAST HD or SD, or the source of the feed like a URL.

sessionTimeout.title: Media session server timeout
sessionTimeout.description: Indicates the amount of time, in seconds, that passed between the user's last known interaction and the moment the session was closed.

qoe.title: Quality of experience
qoe.description: Timed media properties related to the content playback's quality of experience (QoE).

error.title: Custom error object
error.description: Quality of experience (QoE) custom error information.

errors.title: Errors
errors.description: The number of errors that were encountered during playback.

buffers.title: Buffer events
buffers.description: The number of buffer states that occurred during a playback session.

bufferTime.title: Total buffer duration
bufferTime.description: Describes the total amount of time in seconds, spent buffering.

bufferImpactedStreams.title: Buffer impacted streams
bufferImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams impacted by buffering.

stalls.title: Stalling events
stalls.description: The number of stall states that occurred during a playback session.

stallTime.title: Total stalling duration
stallTime.description: Describes the duration in seconds in which the playback was stalled during playback.

stallingImpactedStreams.title: Stalling impacted streams
stallingImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams impacted by stalling.

bitrateChanges.title: Bitrate changes
bitrateChanges.description: The number of bitrate change events that occurred during a playback session.

bitrateAverage.title: Average bitrate
bitrateAverage.description: A weighted average of all bitrate values related to the play duration that occurred during a playback session.

bitrateAverageBucket.title: Average bitrate bucket
bitrateAverageBucket.description: The average bitrate (in kbps). The value is predefined buckets at 100kbps intervals.

bitrateChangeImpactedStreams.title: Bitrate change impacted streams
bitrateChangeImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams in which bitrate changes occurred.

droppedFrames.title: Dropped frames
droppedFrames.description: The number of frames dropped during playback of the main content.

droppedFrameImpactedStreams.title: Dropped frame impacted streams
droppedFrameImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams in which frames were dropped.

dropBeforeStarts.title: Drops before starts
dropBeforeStarts.description: Indicates the user abandoned the media stream before the first frame for example, during the pre-roll ad break, or due to an error while loading the content from the CDN.

timeToStart.title: Time to start
timeToStart.description: Describes the duration (in seconds) passed between video load and start.

playerSdkErrors.title: Player SDK Error IDs
playerSdkErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated in the Player.

mediaSdkErrors.title: Media SDK Error IDs
mediaSdkErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated in the Media SDK.

externalSdkErrors.title: External Error IDs
externalSdkErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated outside the Player or SDK.

errorImpactedStreams.title: Error impacted streams
errorImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams in which an error event occurred.

downloadedPlayback.title: Media downloaded flag
downloadedPlayback.description: The stream was played locally on the device after being downloaded.

fullScreen.title: Full screen
fullScreen.description: Timed media properties related to full screen player state.

playerStateSet.title: Player state set
playerStateSet.description: Whether or not the player state is set on that state.

playerStateCount.title: Player state count
playerStateCount.description: The number of times that player state was set on the stream.

playerStateTime.title: Player state time
playerStateTime.description: The total duration of that player state.

chapterAssetReference.title: Chapter asset reference
chapterAssetReference.description: Asset information about the chapter captured by the experience event.

title.title: Chapter name
title.description: The friendly name of the chapter and or segment.

duration.title: Chapter length or duration
duration.description: The length of the chapter, in seconds.

chapterAssetViewDetails.title: Chapter view details
chapterAssetViewDetails.description: View details for the chapter playback captured by the experience event.

index.title: Chapter position
index.description: The index of the chapter inside the content.

offset.title: Chapter offset
offset.description: The offset of the chapter, in seconds, inside the content from the start.

impressions.title: Chapter starts
impressions.description: Describes the intention to play a timed media asset. It does not measure success, as the user might abandon the content before the first frame is viewed.

completes.title: Chapter completes
completes.description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion - this does not necessarily mean the viewer watched the whole video; viewer could have skipped ahead.

timePlayed.title: Chapter time spent
timePlayed.description: Describes the amount of time in seconds spent by a user on a specific timed media asset.

federated.title: Chapter federated
federated.description: Indicates if an experience event was created through data federation or data sharing.

downloadedPlayback.title: Chapter downloaded flag
downloadedPlayback.description: Set to true when the hit is generated due to playing a downloaded chapter content session.

impressions.title: Media starts
impressions.description: Describes the intention to play a timed media asset. It does not measure success, as the user might abandon the content before the first frame is viewed.

completes.title: Content completes
completes.description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion, this does not necessarily mean the viewer watched the whole video; viewer could have skipped ahead.

timePlayed.title: Content time spent
timePlayed.description: The amount of time spent in seconds by a user on a specific timed media asset.

federated.title: Media federated
federated.description: Indicates the experience event was created through data federation or data sharing.

starts.title: Content starts
starts.description: Indicates the first frame of the timed media asset has been viewed for example, the viewer did not abandon during pre-roll ad, or buffering.

mediaSegmentViews.title: Media segment views
mediaSegmentViews.description: Indicates when at least one frame, not necessarily the first has been viewed.

totalTimePlayed.title: Media Time Spent
totalTimePlayed.description: Describes the total amount of time spent by a user on a specific timed media asset, which includes time spent watching ads.

uniqueTimePlayed.title: Unique Time Played
uniqueTimePlayed.description: Describes the sum of the unique intervals seen by a user on a timed media asset - i.e. the length playback intervals viewed multiple times are only counted once.

averageMinuteAudience.title: Average Minute Audience
averageMinuteAudience.description: Describes the average content time spent for a specific media item - i.e. the total content time spent divided by the length for all of the playback sessions.

adCount.title: Ad count
adCount.description: The number of ads started during the playback.

chapterCount.title: Chapter count
chapterCount.description: The number of chapters started during the playback.

progress10.title: 10% Progress marker
progress10.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 10% marker of media based on stream length. The marker is only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

progress25.title: 25% Progress marker
progress25.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 25% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

progress50.title: 50% Progress marker
progress50.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 50% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

progress75.title: 75% Progress marker
progress75.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 75% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

progress95.title: 95% Progress marker
progress95.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 95% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

resumes.title: Content resumes
resumes.description: Marks each playback that was resumed after more than 30 minutes of buffer, pause, or stall period.

estimatedStreams.title: Estimated streams
estimatedStreams.description: The estimated number of video or audio streams per each individual content.

pauseImpactedStreams.title: Pause impacted streams
pauseImpactedStreams.description: Indicates if one or more pauses occurred during the playback of a single media item.

pauses.title: Pause events
pauses.description: The number of pause periods that occurred during playback.

pauseTime.title: Total pause duration
pauseTime.description: Describes the duration in seconds in which playback was paused by the user.

idp.title: MVPD Identifier
idp.description: The MVPD (Multichannel Video Programming Distributor) provided via authentication. [https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=MVPD]

mediaAuth.title: Media authorized
mediaAuth.description: The user has been authorized via authentication.

dayPart.title: Day part
dayPart.description: Defines the time of the day when the content was broadcast or played.

radioStation.title: Radio station
radioStation.description: Name / ID of the radio station.

publisher.title: Audio content publisher
publisher.description: Name of the audio content publisher.

playhead.title: Player time playhead
playhead.description: If the content is live, the playhead must be the current second of the day, 0 <= playhead < 86400. If the content is recorded, the playhead must be the current second of content, 0 <= playhead < content length.
